page.title: 12 Religion in West Stafford.
page.content: In our area there are five churches,one chapel and one vicarage. However not many people go to church, in the Third year only 22 out of 78 children go to church or Sunday school or some other place of worship. Two people are Hindu and they go to a meeting once a month in West Bromich.One person is a Muslim and goes to a Mosque.She does not go very often because there is not one in Stafford. Nineteen people are Christian and go to a range of churches. Most of them of them go to the Church of England but four people go to the Baptist,two people go to the Methodist Chapel and one person goes to a Mormon Church.
